name: Rally
description:
You refuse to give up when the tide turns.

Once per rest, if your Endurance is down to less than half its maximum, regain Endurance equal to your BODY score.

Describe how you keep fighting when others would falter.

improvements.name: Second Wind
improvements.description: You may use your Rally ability twice per rest.

improvements.name: Iron Heart
improvements.description: You instead regain twice your BODY score.

improvements.name: Rallying Cry
improvements.description: When you use your Rally ability, any adjacent allies also regain Endurance equal to their BODY score.
